<!-- Code generated by cmd/docsgen. DO NOT EDIT. -->

# Security Endpoints

Principals, groups, grants, row filters, and column masks.

## `GET /api-keys`

List API keys for a principal

Returns a paginated list of API keys associated with the specified principal. Raw key values are not included.

- Operation ID: `listAPIKeys`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |
| `principal_id` | `string` | `false` | Filter by principal identifier. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Paginated list of API keys (no raw key values) |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /api-keys`

Create a new API key

Generates a new API key for the specified principal. The raw key value is returned only in this response and cannot be retrieved later.

- Operation ID: `createAPIKey`

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `201` | API key created (raw key shown only once) |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /api-keys/cleanup`

Delete all expired API keys (admin only)

Removes all API keys that have passed their expiration date. Only administrators can perform this operation.

- Operation ID: `cleanupExpiredAPIKeys`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Number of keys deleted |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `DELETE /api-keys/{apiKeyId}`

Delete an API key

Permanently deletes an API key, immediately revoking access for any client using it.

- Operation ID: `deleteAPIKey`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `apiKeyId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the API key. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `204` | Deleted |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /column-masks/{columnMaskId}/bindings`

Bind mask to principal

Associates a column masking rule with a principal, so that the mask is applied when the principal queries the table.

- Operation ID: `bindColumnMask`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `columnMaskId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the column mask. |

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `204` | Bound |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `DELETE /column-masks/{columnMaskId}/bindings`

## `GET /grants`

List grants

Returns a paginated list of privilege grants, optionally filtered by principal or securable.

- Operation ID: `listGrants`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |
| `principal_id` | `string` | `false` | Filter by principal identifier. |
| `principal_type` | `string` | `false` | Filter by principal type. |
| `securable_id` | `string` | `false` | Filter by securable resource identifier. |
| `securable_type` | `string` | `false` | Filter by securable resource type. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Paginated list of grants |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /grants`

Grant a privilege

Creates a new privilege grant for a principal on a securable resource. Returns the created grant.

- Operation ID: `createGrant`

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `201` | Granted |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `409` | The resource already exists or conflicts with current state. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `DELETE /grants/{grantId}`

Revoke a privilege

Revokes a previously granted privilege by deleting the grant record.

- Operation ID: `deleteGrant`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `grantId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the grant. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `204` | Revoked |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `DELETE /groups/{groupId}`

Delete a group

Permanently removes a group from the system. All memberships and associated grants are also removed.

- Operation ID: `deleteGroup`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `groupId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the group. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `204` | Deleted |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `DELETE /groups/{groupId}/members`

Remove member from group

Removes a specific user or nested group from the specified group.

- Operation ID: `deleteGroupMember`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `groupId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the group. |

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `member_id` | `string` | `true` | Identifier of the member to remove. |
| `member_type` | `string` | `true` | Type of the group member (user or group). |

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `204` | Member removed |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |

## `PUT /principals/{principalId}/admin`

Set or unset admin flag

Updates the admin status of a principal. Only existing admins can promote or demote other principals.

- Operation ID: `updatePrincipalAdmin`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `principalId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the principal. |

| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |

## `POST /tables/{tableId}/column-masks`

Create column mask

Creates a new column masking rule for the specified table. The mask expression defines how column values are transformed.

- Operation ID: `createColumnMask`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `tableId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the table. |

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `201` | Created mask |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /tables/{tableId}/row-filters`

Create row filter

Creates a new row-level security filter for the specified table. The filter expression defines which rows are visible.

- Operation ID: `createRowFilter`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `tableId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the table. |

### Request Body

| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |

| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |
